Package org.gridgain.grid.cache.query

Contains query related public classes and interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GridCacheQuery<K,V> API for creating cache queries.
GridCacheQueryBase<K,V> Base API for all supported types of cache queries: GridCacheQuery, GridCacheReduceQuery, GridCacheTransformQuery.
GridCacheQueryFuture<T> Cache query future returned by GridCacheQuery.execute(GridProjection...) or by analogous methods on GridCacheReduceQuery and GridCacheTransformQuery.
GridCacheQueryMetrics Cache query metrics used to obtain statistics on query.
GridCacheReduceQuery<K,V,R1,R2> Cache query with possible remote and local reducers.
GridCacheTransformQuery<K,V,T> Cache query with possible remote transformer.
 

Enum Summary
GridCacheQueryType Defines different cache query types.
 

Annotation Types Summary
GridCacheQueryH2TextField Annotation for fields or getters to be indexed for full text search using H2 TEXT indexing.
GridCacheQueryLuceneField Annotation for fields or getters to be indexed for full text search using Apache Lucene indexing.
GridCacheQuerySqlField Annotates fields to SQL query on.
 

Package org.gridgain.grid.cache.query Description

Contains query related public classes and interfaces.
